alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:46PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jewell and southeastern Nuckolls Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 345 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hardy, or 20 miles northwest of Belleville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail and wind gusts over 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hardy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
